report-paper:
<#if isNumberedSeries>
			
				
					
						${pub.seriesTitle.text}
					
					${pub.seriesTitle.onlineIssn}
				
				
					${pub.seriesTitle.text}
				
				
					${pub.publicationYear}
				
			
			<#else>
				
					
						${pub.seriesTitle.text}
					
					
						${pub.publicationYear}
					
				
			</#if>
			
				
					<#assign sequence = "first">
					<#list pubContributors as pubContributor>
					
						<#-- The XSD only permits the following values for contributors' "contributor_role" attribute. -->
						<#-- "author", "editor", "chair", "translator" -->
						<#-- Map our relevant contributor type values to a Crossref-compliant value -->
						
						<#if pubContributor.contributorType.text == authorKey>
							<#assign contributorTypeText = "author">
						<#elseif pubContributor.contributorType.text == editorKey>
							<#assign contributorTypeText = "editor">
						</#if>
						
						<#if pubContributor.contributor?? && pubContributor.contributor.isCorporation()>
							${pubContributor.contributor.organization!}
						<#else>
							
								<#if pubContributor.contributor?? && pubContributor.contributor.given??>
									${pubContributor.contributor.given}
								</#if>
								${pubContributor.contributor.family}
								<#if pubContributor.contributor?? && pubContributor.contributor.suffix??>
									${pubContributor.contributor.suffix}
								</#if>
							
						</#if>
						<#assign sequence = "additional">
					</#list>
				
				
					${pub.title}
				
				<#if isNumberedSeries>
					${pub.seriesNumber}
				</#if>
				
					${pub.publicationYear}
				
				<#if pub.startPage?? && pub.endPage??>
				
					${pub.startPage}
					${pub.endPage}
				
				</#if>
				
					${pub.doi}
					${indexPage}
